title: Extend payments UI to allow scheduling cross-border payments
summary: Enhance the payments UI to enable users to schedule cross-border payments, providing a seamless experience for international transactions.

title: Implement FX rate lock option with countdown timer
summary: Introduce an FX rate lock feature with a countdown timer, allowing users to secure favorable exchange rates for their cross-border payments.

title: Display rate expiry details and conditions
summary: Clearly display the expiry details and conditions of the FX rate lock to ensure users are aware of the terms and conditions.

title: Integrate with FX rate providers
summary: Integrate the system with reputable FX rate providers to ensure accurate and up-to-date exchange rates.

title: Manage rate lock commitments and expiry timestamps
summary: Develop a system to manage rate lock commitments and expiry timestamps, ensuring that users are notified of any changes or updates.

title: Implement payment processing with locked FX rate validation
summary: Develop a payment processing system that validates locked FX rates, ensuring that users receive the expected exchange rates for their cross-border payments.

title: Allow partial or full cancellation of scheduled payments
summary: Develop a system that allows users to cancel scheduled payments partially or fully, providing flexibility and control over their cross-border transactions.

title: Implement controls to prevent abuse of rate locks
summary: Develop controls to prevent the abuse of rate locks, ensuring that users do not exploit the system for personal gain.

title: Adhere to regulatory requirements for cross-border payments
summary: Ensure that the system adheres to all regulatory requirements for cross-border payments, maintaining compliance and avoiding potential fines or penalties.

title: Maintain audit logs for all scheduling, locking, and execution events
summary: Maintain detailed audit logs for all scheduling, locking, and execution events, ensuring transparency and accountability in the cross-border payment process.

title: Send confirmation, reminders, and expiry alerts via email, SMS, and in-app notifications
summary: The system should send notifications to users via multiple channels to ensure timely reminders and updates on the status of their scheduled payments, including confirmations, reminders, and expiry alerts.

reasoning.source_summary_fragment: Send confirmation, reminders, and expiry alerts

title: Provide dashboards for finance and compliance teams to monitor outstanding scheduled payments
summary: The system should provide dashboards for finance and compliance teams to track and monitor the status of outstanding scheduled payments, ensuring transparency and control over financial operations.

reasoning.source_summary_fragment: Provide dashboards for finance and compliance teams

title: Handle edge cases such as FX provider unavailability and insufficient account balance
summary: The system should be able to handle edge cases such as unavailability of FX providers and insufficient account balances, ensuring robustness and reliability in cross-border payment processing.

reasoning.source_summary_fragment: Handle edge cases such as FX provider unavailability

title: Implement beta rollout plan with feedback collection framework
summary: The system should have a beta rollout plan that includes a framework for collecting feedback from users, ensuring that the system meets their needs and is reliable.

reasoning.source_summary_fragment: Implement beta rollout plan with feedback collection

title: Deliver updated payment scheduling UI and logic
summary: The system should deliver an updated user interface and logic for payment scheduling, enhancing the user experience and ensuring accurate payment processing.

reasoning.source_summary_fragment: Deliver updated payment scheduling UI and logic
